Hello, coders!

Welcome to SLU Computer Programming Club! This is a club where everything is about coding. We have weekly meeting on 4:00 PM Monday in Linux Lab (Room 121L) in Ritter Hall. During the meeting, we will first have a 20-min talk about useful things for coding, then people can code or talk with other people for the rest of time (usually lasts 40 min).

News

  • 08/28/2014 The first meeting will be held on 09/08/2014 4:00 PM

  • 08/17/2014 Official website is now online.

Useful Links:

Advisor: Dr. Michael Goldwasser

Discuss Coding: github issues

online judge: AMC-ICPC Online Archive

Forum: go here

Get Involved

We use github for most of our activities. So please sign up for an account at Github first. Then make sure that your SLU email is shown somewhere in your profile.

There are several ways to get involved:

  • Apply to give a talk, See guide.
  • Use our github repos. Seeguide.
